attributes.additional_details:
Second to that his leadership has caused the following problems: 

One million people now using food banks
Largest A&E department closure in history
Hundreds of thousands forced to work zero hours contracts
Protected bankers bonuses
Increase the debt deficit
Cost tax payers 1billion GBP selling off royal mail
Targeted 3.6Million disabled people with spending cuts
Introduced the bedroom tax
Caused the first midwife strike in 133 years
Cut taxes of 3bn for the richest 1%
attributes.background: David Cameron's Record as Prime Minister shows he does not put British people before his own interests. The recent release of the "Panama Papers" shows that while campaigning against being tougher on Tax evasion; he has himself reaped rewards of his father's tax avoiding interests.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister or any other Minister is not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
